I help multidisciplinary teams deliver services in a user-centered way by designing accessible experiences.

Hey youðŸ‘‹ I'm Mikey.

I'm a freelance user interface and interaction designer based in Yorkshire and working remotely in the UK.

I have delivered projects to a range of Government organisations including the The Department for Work and Pensions, Universal Credits, NHS Digital and supporting the GDS design system.
I have also worked in various industries outside of Government organisations including Manchester City, Sky Bet, British Airways, Royal Mail, GOV.UK, Sky Sports, Argos, and Jet2.

Read more about me

Want to work with me?

Working closely with my clients, I pride myself on being very easy to work alongside and have often slotted smoothly into any team and delivered some great services and websites.
